media:group.media:description:
üìç Despite agreement on the text of a normalization treaty, Azerbaijan accuses Armenia of multiple ceasefire violations, a claim rejected by the Armenian Prime Minister‚Äôs office. üìç Switzerland will host a Peace Forum for Nagorno-Karabakh following the approval of a parliamentary bill mandating the initiative today. üìç Legal Battles and Peace Deals: What‚Äôs Next for Armenia?- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zAaUAolQwHM
